summary.value: You protect one of your allies from harm

system.description:
When another creature is threatened by an attack, spell, or other danger, you may take their place (any Checks that are part of the danger will be performed against you; you may declare the use of this Skill before the Checks have been made). If the danger already affected you, it affects you twice (resolve both instances separately); you also cannot protect multiple creatures from the same danger.

After you use this skill, you cannot use it again until the start of your next turn.
